entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as gliding back to her seat and smiling at Cedric. She is also mentioned as giving Harry a patronizing look.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is described as passing Fleur and handing over his wand to Mr. Ollivander.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is described as being enthusiastic about Cedric's wand and remembering its characteristics.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking down at his own wand and trying to rub it clean surreptitiously.

relationships.description: Mr. Ollivander is described as examining Cedric's wand and remembering its characteristics.
Fleur is described as giving Harry a patronizing look.
Mr. Ollivander is described as examining Harry's wand and noticing its finger marks.
Cedric is described as handing over his wand to Mr. Ollivander.
